labels.name: P2: Fix can wait a while

data.system_settings: Google Chrome    69.0.3497.100 (Official Build) (64-bit) (cohort: Stable), Windows 10 Pro 10.0.16299 (Build 16299) x64
data.actual_result: The emoji is added with a reaction, along with another reaction with the 'character not found' symbol
data.expected_result: The emoji should display properly as a reaction
data.short_description: Unicode emojis display incorrectly in reactions
data.steps_to_repro: - Open Discord Canary for web - Add a in-built emoji to a message (e.g. `:regional_indicator_a:`) - View the reaction (through the browser)
